directions: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in onion and sweet pepper, and cook until tender. Mix in beans. Season with oregano, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper. Continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until beans are heated through.
ingredients: 1  yellow gypsy (bull horn) sweet pepper, chopped
1 (15 ounce) can great Northern beans, drained
title: White Beans and Peppers
